org.apache.flink.util

类 FileUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.util.FileUtils

  • public final class FileUtils
extends Object
    This is a utility class to deal with temporary files.

    • 方法概要

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static boolean deletePathIfEmpty(FileSystem fileSystem, Path path)
      Deletes the path if it is empty (does not contain any other directories/files).
      static String getRandomFilename(String prefix)
      Constructs a random filename with the given prefix and a random part generated from hex characters.
      static String readFile(File file, String charsetName) 
      static String readFileUtf8(File file) 
      static void writeFile(File file, String contents, String encoding)

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRandomFilename

        public static String getRandomFilename(String prefix)
        Constructs a random filename with the given prefix and a random part generated from hex characters.
        参数:
        prefix - the prefix to the filename to be constructed
        返回:
        the generated random filename with the given prefix

      • deletePathIfEmpty

        public static boolean deletePathIfEmpty(FileSystem fileSystem,
                                        Path path)
                                 throws IOException
        Deletes the path if it is empty (does not contain any other directories/files).
        参数:
        fileSystem - to use
        path - to be deleted if empty
        返回:
        true if the path could be deleted; otherwise false
        抛出:
        IOException - if the delete operation fails
